channel.title: Cyberbullying
channel.description:
hello my name is suarez and i have a tip for people who are complaining about cyberbullying
if someone is cyberbullying u on mopar :-))) u must
1. click this fu[b][/b]cking button right here
[IMG]http://puu.sh/9OUis/081967c9ed.jpg[/img]
2. or this [IMG]http://puu.sh/9OUTP/e1c25545dd.jpg[/img]
and u shall be free from the dangerous and scary world of hurtful words on a web forum
examples of cyberbullying :-) ;D :D :D
<Albi> Niall, can u ban pakis * Niall sets ban on Albi!*@* <classic> LOL <Niall> I sure can
<classic> i am now a majestic 6'5" black man with rippling muscles, gorgeous pink locks, sexy legs, married to all my 2d waifus who bore me 8 beautiful children <classic> ama 20:37:16 <eckostylez> you're a faggot is what you are
<Pure> Svitkona, <Pure> fudgeing hell <Pure> you are truly the biggest fudgeing retard on this server
<cats> that dude looks exactly like robert downey jr <Paradigm> thats a picture of robert downey jr u idiot
<Pookey71> fudge off classic_ <Pookey71> how about you go kill yourself? <Pookey71> you fudgeing prick <Pookey71> eat a dick runt
people can argue that a notorious cyber bully can ruin ur day but all u have to do is log off??? if u want u can stay on the forums and or irc and cry silently over the computer screen :D :rolleyes: :cool:
this is my opinion thank u very much and have a wonderful night
example of wonderful person against cyberbullying :D
<classic_> what th eufck <Tom> omfg <Tom> shut up classic_

item.title: Cyberbullying
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

locked for spam

if you feel like this lock/warning was cyberbullying:

[quote=“Classic, post:1, topic:544419”]1. click this fucking button right here

[/quote]

[quote=“Mopman, post:6, topic:544419”]Unlocking as I assume it was an accidental lock - if it was intentional, surely somebody would have posted a message here explaining why they locked it so everyone knew who and why?[/quote]i was double checking something before i posted

Read full topic
